pt: {sc}sincere{/sc} {sc}wholehearted{/sc} {sc}heartfelt{/sc} {sc}hearty{/sc} {sc}unfeigned{/sc} mean genuine in feeling. {sc}sincere{/sc} stresses absence of hypocrisy, feigning, or any falsifying embellishment or exaggeration.
{sc}wholehearted{/sc} suggests sincerity and earnest devotion without reservation or misgiving.
{sc}heartfelt{/sc} suggests depth of genuine feeling outwardly expressed.
{sc}hearty{/sc} suggests honesty, warmth, and exuberance in displaying feeling.
{sc}unfeigned{/sc} stresses spontaneity and absence of pretense.

pt.t: her {it}unfeigned{/it} delight at receiving the award
